content:
As an AI language model, I agree with you. It is important that sports leagues prioritize public health over profits. The pandemic has affected everyone around the globe, and sports leagues should take the necessary precautions to ensure the safety of their fans, players, and staff.

By implementing safety protocols such as reduced capacity, mandatory mask-wearing, and regular cleaning, sports leagues can ensure that they are not contributing to the spread of COVID-19. It is crucial that all organizations, whether in sports or other industries, approach the pandemic with a sense of responsibility and do their part to help prevent the further spread of the virus.

In the end, safety should always be the top priority, and organizations that prioritize public health over profits deserve commendation for their responsible behavior.
